TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit NetCodeGroup extends System.Security.Policy.CodeGroup
Public NotInheritable Class NetCodeGroup Inherits CodeGroup
public ref class NetCodeGroup sealed : System::Security::Policy::CodeGroup

summary.span: 將 Web 使用權限授權給下載組件的來源站台。

span.span: Grants Web permission to the site from which the assembly was downloaded.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 程式碼群組是建置組塊的程式碼存取安全性原則。Code groups are the building blocks of code access security policy. 每個原則層級是由根程式碼群組可以有一個以上的子程式碼群組所組成。Each policy level consists of a root code group that can have one or more child code groups. 每一個子程式碼群組可以有它自己的子程式碼群組;此行為會延伸到任何數目的層級，進而形成樹狀。Each child code group can have its own child code groups; this behavior extends to any number of levels, forming a tree. 每個程式碼群組具有成員資格條件，判斷指定的組件所屬的群組中，根據該組件的辨識項。Each code group has a membership condition that determines if a given assembly belongs to the group, based on the evidence for that assembly. 僅有程式碼群組的成員資格條件符合指定的組件，它們的子程式碼群組，以及適用於程式碼存取安全性原則。Only code groups whose membership conditions match a given assembly, along with their child code groups, apply code access security policy. 具有的相同的合併語意; 組件可構成的聯集物件的所有相符的子程式碼群組和它會從輸入產生辨識項。 has the same merge semantics as that of ; it forms the union of the objects of all matching child code groups and the it generates from the input evidence. 不過，會傳回包含以動態方式導出的權限授與連線存取，以從中執行程式碼; 站台只會傳回靜態的權限集合。However, returns a permission containing a dynamically calculated that grants connect access to the site from which the code is run; simply returns a static permission set. 當已建立，它包含下表所示的預設連線存取規則。When a is created, it contains the default connection access rules shown in the following table. |URI 配置URI Scheme|規則Rule| |----------------|----------| |檔案file|不連線到原始伺服器允許存取。No connection access to the origin server is permitted.| |httphttp|使用 原始連接埠來允許 HTTP 和 HTTPS 存取。HTTP and HTTPS access is permitted using the origin port.| |httpshttps|使用 原始連接埠來允許 HTTPS 存取。HTTPS access is permitted using the origin port.| 您可以控制配置和程式碼可以藉由傳遞回其原始網站的連接時使用的連接埠與適當的物件並屬性值來方法。You can control the scheme and port that code is permitted to use when connecting back to its site of origin by passing a object with the appropriate and property values to the method. 您可以建立適用於當原始配置不存在於辨識項，或無法辨識指定的連接存取規則("") 做為配置。You can create a connection access rule that applies when the origin scheme is not present in the evidence or is not recognized by specifying ("") as the scheme. 您也可以建立適用於當沒有相符的配置與連線存取規則，藉由指定的連接存取規則("\*") 做為配置。You can also create a connection access rule that applies when there is no connection access rule with a matching scheme by specifying ("\*") as the scheme. > [!NOTE] > 如果程式碼不會提交做為辨識項的 URI 配置，被允許存取，回復到原始網站使用任何配置。If code does not submit the URI scheme as evidence, access is permitted using any scheme back to the origin site. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何建立並新增下載使用 HTTP 配置的程式碼的物件。The following code example demonstrates creating a and adding objects for code downloaded using the HTTP scheme. [!code-cpp[NclCodeGroup#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclCodeGroup/cpp/sample.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[NclCodeGroup#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclCodeGroup/CS/sample.cs#3)]

span.span: A membership condition that tests evidence to determine whether this code group applies code access security policy.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當已建立，它包含下表所示的預設連線存取規則。When a is created, it contains the default connection access rules shown in the following table. |配置Scheme|規則Rule| |------------|----------| |檔案file|不連線到原始伺服器允許存取。No connection access to the origin server is permitted.| |httphttp|使用 原始連接埠來允許 HTTP 和 HTTPS 存取。HTTP and HTTPS access is permitted using the origin port.| |httpshttps|使用 原始連接埠來允許 HTTPS 存取。HTTPS access is permitted using the origin port.| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何建立並新增下載使用 HTTP 配置的程式碼的物件。The following code example demonstrates creating a and adding objects for code downloaded using the HTTP scheme. [!code-cpp[NclCodeGroup#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclCodeGroup/cpp/sample.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[NclCodeGroup#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclCodeGroup/CS/sample.cs#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly AbsentOriginScheme As String

summary.span: 包含用來指定程式碼 (具有未知或無法辨認之原始配置) 連接存取的值。

span.span: Contains a value used to specify connection access for code with an unknown or unrecognized origin scheme.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當呼叫方法中，您指定配置和相關聯物件。When calling the method, you specify a scheme and an associated object. 任何加入至物件使用做為原點的程式碼的原始配置不會在它的辨識項，或無法配置所能辨識時，會套用配置物件。Any objects that you add to the using as the origin scheme are applied when the code's origin scheme is not present in its evidence, or is not a scheme recognized by the object. 若要指定程式碼的原始配置不符合任何加入至目前的原始結構描述集合中包含結構描述時所要使用的物件物件，請使用值。To specify the objects to use when the code's origin scheme does not match any of the schemes contained in the set of origin schemes added to the current object, use the value. 值欄位為空字串 ("")。The value of the field is an empty string ("").

MemberSignature.Value: public void AddConnectAccess (string originScheme, System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess connectAccess);

param.name: connectAccess

summary.span: 將指定的連接存取加入至目前的程式碼群組。

span.span: Adds the specified connection access to the current code group.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以加入多個物件相同`origin scheme`。You can add multiple objects for the same `origin scheme`. 如果`origin scheme`已經有一或多個相關聯物件，指定了`null`如`connectAccess`沒有任何作用。If an `origin scheme` already has one or more associated objects, specifying `null` for `connectAccess` has no effect. 如果沒有關聯的原始配置物件，指定了`null`for`connectAccess`可防止使用符合原始配置的程式碼`originScheme`存取其原始伺服器。If the origin scheme does not have associated objects, specifying `null` for `connectAccess` prevents code with an origin scheme that matches `originScheme` from accessing its origin server. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立和新增物件至。The following code example demonstrates creating and adding objects to a . summary.span: 包含用來指定任何其他未指定原始配置的值。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當呼叫方法中，您指定配置和相關聯物件。When calling the method, you specify a scheme and an associated object. 您可以使用的值欄位來指定物件，其應該用於任何未明確包含在組加入至目前的原始配置的配置物件。You can use the value of the field to specify the objects that should be used for any scheme that is not explicitly contained in the set of origin schemes added to the current object. 使用指定的物件欄位才會使用程式碼的原始配置不符合任何結構描述加入至目前的原始結構描述集合中包含物件。The objects specified with the field are only used if the code's origin scheme does not match any of the schemes contained in the set of origin schemes added to the current object. 若要指定物件來套用程式碼的原始配置不適用於它的辨識項，或無法辨識時使用值。To specify the objects to apply when the code's origin scheme is not available in its evidence or is not recognized, use the value. 值欄位是 「 \* 」。The value of the field is "\*".

summary.span: 製作目前程式碼群組的深層複本 (Deep Copy)。

span.span: An equivalent copy of the current code group, including its membership conditions and child code groups.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法會讓程式碼群組，這表示也會在所有包含的物件複本的程式碼群組的深層複本。This method makes a deep copy of the code group, meaning that copies of all objects the code group contains are also made.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ResetConnectAccess() cil managed

summary.span: 移除目前程式碼群組的所有連接存取資訊。

span.span: Removes all connection access information for the current code group.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法來移除系統提供的預設連接的存取規則。Use this method to remove the system-supplied default connection access rules. 下表顯示的預設規則。The default rules are shown in the following table. |配置Scheme|規則Rule| |------------|----------| |檔案file|不連線到原始伺服器允許存取。No connection access to the origin server is permitted.| |httphttp|使用 原始連接埠來允許 HTTP 和 HTTPS 存取。HTTP and HTTPS access is permitted using the origin port.| |httpshttps|使用 原始連接埠來允許 HTTPS 存取。HTTPS access is permitted using the origin port.| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫這個方法，以移除預設程式碼存取連線規則。The following code example demonstrates calling this method to remove the default code access connection rules. [!code-cpp[NclCodeGroup#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclCodeGroup/cpp/sample.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[NclCodeGroup#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclCodeGroup/CS/sample.cs#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.Policy.PolicyStatement Resolve(class System.Security.Policy.Evidence evidence) cil managed

span.span: The for the assembly.

summary.span: 解析程式碼群組的原則和其辨識項集合的子代。

span.span: Resolves policy for the code group and its descendants for a set of evidence.

returns.span: ，是由含選擇性屬性之程式碼群組授與的使用權限所組成，如果程式碼群組無法套用 (成員資格條件不符合指定的辨識項)，則為 。

span.span: A that consists of the permissions granted by the code group with optional attributes, or if the code group does not apply (the membership condition does not match the specified evidence).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定要載入的組件辨識項，這個方法會評估第一個檢查成員資格條件，針對指定的辨識項的程式碼群組。Given evidence for an assembly to be loaded, this method evaluates the code group by first checking the membership condition against the specified evidence. 如果沒有相符項目，則這個方法會傳回程式碼群組，包括評估子程式碼群組的原則陳述式。If there is a match, this method returns a policy statement for the code group, including evaluation of child code groups. 此方法的作業如下所示：The operation of this method is as follows: 如果成員資格條件不符合指定的辨識項，傳回`null`，則為集合設定為傳回 (P) 的權限設為程式碼群組的原則陳述式，並繼續。If the membership condition does not match the specified evidence, return `null`; otherwise, set the permission set to be returned (P) equal to the code group's policy statement and continue. 每個子程式碼群組，解決程式碼群組與相同的辨識項。如果結果不是`null`，傳回該原則陳述式。For each child code group, resolve the code group with the same evidence; if the result is not `null`, return that policy statement. 如果沒有子程式碼群組相符，則傳回 P （父系的原則陳述式）。If no child code group matched, return P (the parent's policy statement).

span.span: The parameter is .

exception.span: 一個以上的程式碼群組 (包含父程式碼群組和任何的子程式碼群組) 標記為 。

span.span: More than one code group (including the parent code group and any child code groups) is marked .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.Policy.CodeGroup ResolveMatchingCodeGroups(class System.Security.Policy.Evidence evidence) cil managed

span.span: The evidence for the assembly.

summary.span: 解析符合的程式碼群組。

span.span: Resolves matching code groups.

returns.span: 與辨識項相符的一組完整的程式碼群組。

span.span: The complete set of code groups that were matched by the evidence.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定要載入的組件辨識項，這個方法會評估第一個檢查成員資格條件，針對指定的辨識項的程式碼群組。Given evidence for an assembly to be loaded, this method evaluates the code group by first checking the membership condition against the specified evidence. 如果沒有相符項目，則這個方法會傳回根程式碼群組。If there is a match, this method returns a root code group. 傳回程式碼群組可能包含，反而可能也會出現子程式碼群組，因此傳回的值會反映出一組完整的程式碼群組提供的辨識項相符子程式碼群組。The code group that is returned may contain child code groups, which, in turn, may also have child code groups, so the return value reflects the complete set of code groups that were matched by the evidence provided.

span.span: The parameter is .
